name: Goblin Dash
description:
Goblin Dash is an action platformer game where the player controls a small goblin character and tries to complete challenging levels. The game plays similarly to other action platformer games, allowing the player to move the goblin character up and down to jump across platforms and defeat enemies. The game challenges the player with difficult abilities and mechanics, and requires skill as a platformer to complete. Overall, Goblin Dash is an action-packed and challenging platformer game.

Do your best and complete all the chapters as soon as possible. Let's see if you can cross the endless dungeon and survive in the green biome. If you're a lucky kid, you can also see the ice golem. Remember, everything is trying to kill you. Don't be sad if you die, it's just an action-packed dream.

The controls are simple and accessible - simply jump and dash.

Endless Dungeon!!
The first step of your dreams begins with the endless dungeon.
The falling blocks are the pieces that fall after you touch them. Levels sometimes require these pieces to drop. Sometimes try not to touch them.
If you get in the line of sight of insect-like enemies, they will follow you. When they do, kicking it down may be the best solution. Dash them.
Fires burn. You can get rid of them simply by not touching them.


Green Biom!!
Watch out for the traps of the green biome!!

Icemancik
You must escape before his wand falls to the ground.
You can find a lot of Icemancik in the Ice biome. It can spawn an Ice Golem. Can you beat him?
You can collect all the hidden coins, but I cannot say you “Gotta Catch 'Em All!”
